overview: After a severe head injury, teenager Jeffery Summers considers himself to be a successful talk show host, but after no longer being recognised in the street he comes to TV fan and psychiatrist, Dr. Lincoln. As Dr. Lincoln doesn't recognize Jeffery he comes to the conclusion that he never really was famous. While their relationship evolves, Jeffery learns how he never really was famous and what he misses about the fame he never had
title: The Sixteenth Minute
